title: Crooklyn
creator_contributor_role: 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Family - United States
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/African Americans in motion pictures
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/African Americans in motion pictures
description: Make yourself at home with the Carmichael family as they experience one very special summer in their Brooklyn neighborhood that they've affectionately nicknamed 'Crooklyn'. Alfre Woodard stars as a loving, but fiercely independent mother who along with her musician husband Woody (Delroy Lindo) struggles to raise her family in difficult but often wonderful circumstances. Cast also includes David Patrick Kelly, Jose Zuniga, Isaiah Washington, Ivelka Reyes, Spike Lee, N. Jeremi Duru and Zelda Harris.
